message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. This is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $13,000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little further to $13,500.  This is a great deal for you, and it allows me to still make a reasonable profit.  What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you consider that?
